lyrics:
7 contributorsi bruise easily lyricsintro
ohoohooh mmm yeah

verse 1
my skin is like a map
of where my heart has been
and i cant hide the marks
but its not a negative thing
so i let down my guard drop my defenses down by my clothes
im learning to fall with no safety net to cushion the blow

chorus
i bruise easily so be gentle when you handle me
theres a mark you leave
like a love heart carved on a tree
i bruise easily
cant scratch the surface without moving me
underneath i bruise easily
i bruise easily yeah

verse 2
i found your fingerprints
on a glass of wine
do you know youre leaving them
all over this heart of mine too
but if i never take this leap of faith ill never know
so im learning to fall with no safety net to cushion the blow
you might also likechorus

theres a mark you leave
like a love heart carved on a tree
i bruise easily
cant scratch the surface without moving me
underneath i bruise easily yeah yeah yeah
i bruise easily

bridge
anyone who can touch you
can hurt you or heal you
anyone who can reach you
can love you or leave you
so be gentle ahah so be gentle
so be gentle
yeah yeah so be gentle so be gentle
oh oh oh oh oh
